title: Introducing Sprout, a new humanoid development platform
description:
Fauna Robotics unveils Sprout: a safe, character-driven robot designed to live, work, and play alongside humans in everyday life.

The post Introducing Sprout, a new humanoid development platform appeared first on The Robot Report.
